txt.en:
'It seems that the White Hand is coming against us from all sides here in Eregion, [placeholder]. The note you brought me clearly mentions 'Pembar.' Pembar is near our way-post at Echad Eregion. If the half-orcs are at work in that area, then our kindred need to know.

'To find Echad Eregion, head south out of Gwingris. Look to the south-east as you follow the road... Echad Eregion will be found amid some small ruins.

'Deliver this message to Lengliel. She will know what to do.'
'Well met and welcome to Echad Eregion. What news do you bring from Gwingris?\n\n'Half-orcs stealing worm-eggs? Yes, I know somewhat of this. Let us speak further on the matter....'
'Echad Eregion is south-east of Gwingris. Follow the road out of Gwingris, and you should find it soon enough.'
Calelloth believes news of the half-orcs' dealings with the worms of Eregion should be conveyed throughout the Elf-camps.
Talk to Lengliel at Echad Eregion
Lengliel is at Echad Eregion, south-east of Gwingris.\n\nCalelloth has asked you to deliver a letter to Lengliel regarding the half-orcs and worms.
